detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: We listen first to understand who you are and what your goals are. This ensures that our advice is tailored to your specific needs.

detailsData.title: Regular Updates
detailsData.content: You will never be left wondering about the status of your matter. We provide regular updates and respond to all e-mails promptly.

detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: Darian M. Butcher has extensive experience in probate and fiduciary litigation. She has practiced at top firms and clerked at the Massachusetts Appeals Court.

detailsData.title: Professional Fiduciary Services
detailsData.content: We offer high-touch, duty-focused services as trustee, personal representative, guardian, and conservator. Our experience ensures your fiduciary needs are met with the highest standards.

subHeading: For Your Trust and Estate Litigation, Guardianship, and Conservatorship Needs.
valueProp: We listen first. Before we can give you any advice we need to know who you are and what your goals are. In all aspects of our practice, we provide a client-centered approach that begins with listening to you.
topics: Actions concerning breach of fiduciary duty
Actions concerning lack of capacity and undue influence
Actions concerning the removal of trustees and personal representatives

testimonalData.text: Darian provided exceptional service and was always available to answer my questions.
